item.title: Project - Big Data
item.description: Start Clear Random Game speed : Explore the figures designed by the creators Glider Spaceship The game of life and Big Data My world is made up of cells. Black or white, 1 or 0, dead or alive... Each generation, an iteration and a period of evolution and use of data Big Data fuels the understanding of complex and living systems. This last human invention was already present before our arrival on earth.
item.content:
Explore the figures designed by the creators

The game of life and Big Data

My world is made up of cells. Black or white, 1 or 0, dead or alive...

Each generation, an iteration and a period of evolution and use of data

Big Data fuels the understanding of complex and living systems. This last human invention was already present before our arrival on earth.

In the end, would we be here without Big Data?

item.title: Project - Big Data
item.description: Is he Alive ? What a beautiful synergy! The tools we use every day are much better organized than we are. Big data can create a logical life form within the tools we use most. Big data is a precursor to the form of life.
item.content:
Is he Alive ?

What a beautiful synergy!

The tools we use every day are much better organized than we are.

Big data can create a logical life form within the tools we use most.

Big data is a precursor to the form of life.

item.title: Openreplay
item.description: Openreplay contributor Openreplay is a log and sessions replay solution. The self-hosted solution could not be installed locally, with the docker-compose method. I change the docker-compose method to allow local installation of openreplay.
item.content:
Openreplay contributor

Openreplay is a log and sessions replay solution.

The self-hosted solution could not be installed locally, with the docker-compose method.

I change the docker-compose method to allow local installation of openreplay.

item.title: Savinien Barbotaud
item.description: Hi, I’m Savinien ! I am an apprentice engineer in the IT field at ENSSAT, in Lannion where I am expected to graduate in 2025. I am always looking for new things to learn and give. Development, cyber security, system or network administration are topics on which my internship can focus, and I’m interested in. Currently focus on real-time communication developpement at Apizee through a work-study program. My Github personal repo: https://github.
item.content:
Hi,

I’m Savinien !

I am an apprentice engineer in the IT field at ENSSAT, in Lannion where I am expected to graduate in 2025.

I am always looking for new things to learn and give. Development, cyber security, system or network administration are topics on which my internship can focus, and I’m interested in.

Currently focus on real-time communication developpement at Apizee through a work-study program.

  • My Github personal repo: https://github.com/Shahere
  • My Github professional repo: https://github.com/SavinienBarbotaud

You can reach me at sbarbota@enssat.fr

item.title: Skills
item.description: Current work Apizee I’m currently working in co-op program at Apizee. My goal is to develop features, and do intern support for the Javascript library ApiRTC. After 1 year at Apizee, I’m proud to contributing to the compagny. I achieve some internals security features, translate apiRTC to Flutter and react-native, and install openreplay to help Apizee’s support. At Apizee, I have progressed in a lot of computer science area, Docker, Kubernetes, network management, operating system management…
item.content:
Current work

Apizee

I’m currently working in co-op program at Apizee.

My goal is to develop features, and do intern support for the Javascript library ApiRTC.

After 1 year at Apizee, I’m proud to contributing to the compagny. I achieve some internals security features, translate apiRTC to Flutter and react-native, and install openreplay to help Apizee’s support.

At Apizee, I have progressed in a lot of computer science area, Docker, Kubernetes, network management, operating system management…

Previous work

DIRISI

For my 1st job in computer science, I was welcomed at the DIRISI’s french army branch.

My goal was to develop an Django (Python) web appplication for ships, monitoring traffic

Summer work

Sailing instructor

My first job was at the Loguivy nautical club as sailing instructor.

My role was to teach sailing to the youngest

item.title: SW Discord
item.description: Summoner war - Discord bot The bot I created is used to analyze a Summoner war game mode. He provide stats, when a user provide a specific JSON file. The code is available on github.
item.content:
Summoner war - Discord bot

The bot I created is used to analyze a Summoner war game mode.

He provide stats, when a user provide a specific JSON file.

The code is available on github.
